title: What are some good examples of jingles? - Quora

response.answer_text: My favorite jingle is for Fall River Pawn Brokers, a pawn shop chain headquartered in Massachusetts. I know the owner and he is a really nice person!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!. His name is Dana and he lives next door to my distant first cousins Thomas Frizzell Jr. and his wife Susie Frizzell on Rockdale Avenue in New Bedford, Massachusetts THE JINGLE GOES “Fall River Pawn Brokers. Money when you need it. Come and see us today or call 1–877–99-WE-PAY.”

A recent jingle that became an instant classic is for J.G. Wentworth, the quick cash company: “I have a structured settlement and I need cash now, Call J.G. Wentworth, 877-Cash Now…” Classic technique - repeat, repeat repeat. The Wagnerian Opera spoof just helps make the music a little “stickier” (more memorable). J.G. Wentworth Commercial - Viking Opera
